<!-- Auto-generated by zod-args-parser -->

# listy

**Listy** is a simple CLI to showcase arguments **parsing** and **validation**.

**Example:**

```bash
listy --help
listy help add-items
listy add-items --list groceries --items egg,milk,bread --tags food
listy remove-items --list todos clean cook
listy create-list groceries "List of groceries"
listy delete-list groceries
```

## Options:

### `--help, -h` _optional_

Show help message.

### `--version, -v` _optional_

Show listy version.

### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

## Subcommands:

### add-items, a, add

Add new items to the list.

**Example:**

```bash
listy add --list groceries --items egg,milk,bread --tags food
listy add --list todos --items clean,cook --tags chores,work
```

#### Options:

#### `--list, -l <list-name>` _optional_

The name of the list to add items to.

**default:** `"default"`

#### `--items, -i <item, ...items>`

The items to add to the list. separated by a comma `,`.

#### `--tags, -t <tag, ...tags>` _optional_

The tags to add to the list. separated by a comma `,`.

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

---

### remove-items, r, remove [options] &lt;...items&gt;

Remove items from the list.

**Example:**

```bash
listy remove --list groceries egg milk bread
listy remove --list todos clean cook
```

#### Options:

#### `--list, -l <list-name>`

The name of the list to remove items from.

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

---

### create-list, cl

Create a new list.

**Example:**

```bash
listy create-list groceries "List of groceries"
```

#### Options:

#### `--overwrite, -o` _optional_

Overwrite the list if it already exists.

**default:** `false`

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

#### Arguments:

#### `list-name`

The name of the list to create.

#### `list-description` _optional_

The description of the list to create.

---

### delete-list, dl

Delete a specific list.

**Example:**

```bash
listy delete-list groceries
```

#### Options:

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

#### Arguments:

#### `list-name`

The name of the list to delete.

---

### help &lt;command&gt;

Print help message for command

#### Options:

#### `--verbose` _optional_

Enable verbose mode.

#### Arguments:

#### `command-name` _optional_

Command to print help for.  
**Available commands:** `add-items`, `create-list`, `delete-list`, `remove-items`, `help`
